amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the definition of "undue degradation" in the legislation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-416 to strike the definition of `undue degradation' in the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 244 (Roll no. 1030).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pearce.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
